name: FeelGood
description:
For this game, the theme was that I had to create something personal. After some extremely long and hard thoughts, I decided that creating a game based on how we perceive the good and bad.

The game puts you inside this enclosed space, and you are able to manipulate the blocks coming in from either side to create a structure that will let you climb out the top. Its meant to be reminiscent of overcoming the good and the bad, and how the things in the past mould who you are.

Once you have overcome the obstacle, you are left with a statue of all the blocks you have placed.

Assets Used - Area 730
